alert.note: Alert for Hartford; Tolland (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 5:11PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Tolland and southeastern Hartford Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 510 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a developing thunderstorm over Rocky Hill, or near Wethersfield. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. In addition, locally heavy rainfall could lead to nuisance poor-drainage flooding. Locations impacted include... East Hartford, Glastonbury, Newington, Wethersfield, Berlin, Rocky Hill, Hebron and Marlborough. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. This storm may intensify. Stay tuned to your local media for updates and possible warnings.
